snippet: A group of nonprofit organizations filed a lawsuit Wednesday seeking to force the Transportation Security Administration to complete the rulemaking process for the use of body scanners in airports.
lead_paragraph: A group of nonprofit organizations filed a lawsuit Wednesday seeking to force the Transportation Security Administration to complete the rulemaking process for the use of body scanners in airports.

headline.main: Nonprofit Groups Sue Over Airport Body Scanners
headline.print_headline: Nonprofit Groups Sue Over Airport Body Scanners
